system.requirements:
Tier 3: Hardened Soul, 20+ Corruption
Aptitudes: Toughness, Willpower
system.effect: When character would test to gain a mutation as a result of corruption. They can choose to automatically pass the test, instead they gain a Malignancy and 1d10 Corruption.
